results.title: Amlodipine in the current management of hypertension
results.text_hl: Side effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ include @DISEASE_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@edema@@@, @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@palpitations@@@, @DISEASE_Dizziness @DISEASE_MESH:D004244 @@@dizziness@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Flushing</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005483 @@@flushing@@@, which are more common with the higher dose of 10 mg.

citations.NLM: Wang JG, Palmer BF, Vogel Anderson K, Sever P. Amlodipine in the current management of hypertension J Clin Hypertens (Greenwich). 2023 Aug 7;():. PMID: 37551050
citations.BibTeX: @article{37551050, title={Amlodipine in the current management of hypertension}, author={Wang JG and Palmer BF and Vogel Anderson K and Sever P}, journal={J Clin Hypertens (Greenwich)}}

results.title: Amlodipine associated hyperpigmentation.
results.text_hl: Although @DISEASE_Hyperpigmentation @DISEASE_MESH:D017495 @@@cutaneous hyperpigmentation@@@ was most prominent on the photoexposed areas, there was no history of previous photosensitivity, @DISEASE_Pruritus @DISEASE_MESH:D011537 @@@pruritus@@@ or @<m>DISEASE_Flushing</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005483 @@@flushing@@@. To our knowledge, no case of @DISEASE_Hyperpigmentation @DISEASE_MESH:D017495 @@@oral and cutaneous hyperpigmentation@@@ associated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ has been formally reported up to date.

citations.NLM: Erbagci Z. Amlodipine associated hyperpigmentation. Saudi Med J. 2004 Jan;25(1):103-5. PMID: 14758392
citations.BibTeX: @article{14758392, title={Amlodipine associated hyperpigmentation.}, author={Erbagci Z}, journal={Saudi Med J}, volume={25}, number={1}, pages={103-5}}

results.title: Amlodipine: The double edged sword.
results.text_hl: This is mainly due to its long half-life making it easy to use as a single daily dose. @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ is associated with common side effects like @<m>DISEASE_Flushing</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005483 @@@flushing@@@, @DISEASE_Headache @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headache@@@ and @DISEASE_Dizziness @DISEASE_MESH:D004244 @@@dizziness@@@.

citations.NLM: Rabah F, El-Naggari M, Al-Nabhani D. Amlodipine: The double edged sword. J Paediatr Child Health. 2017 Jun;53(6):540-542. PMID: 28387969
citations.BibTeX: @article{28387969, title={Amlodipine: The double edged sword.}, author={Rabah F and El-Naggari M and Al-Nabhani D}, journal={J Paediatr Child Health}, volume={53}, number={6}, pages={540-542}}

results.title: An update on the safety of amlodipine.
results.text_hl: Although @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ is a potent vasodilator, there was a low incidence of side effects such as @DISEASE_Headache @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headache@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Flushing</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005483 @@@flushing@@@, and @DISEASE_Dizziness @DISEASE_MESH:D004244 @@@dizziness@@@.

citations.NLM: Osterloh IH. An update on the safety of amlodipine. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1991;17 Suppl 1():S65-8. PMID: 16296714
citations.BibTeX: @article{16296714, title={An update on the safety of amlodipine.}, author={Osterloh IH}, journal={J Cardiovasc Pharmacol}, volume={17 Suppl 1}, pages={S65-8}}

results.title: Amlodipine besylate induced acute interstitial nephritis.
results.text_hl: ...Adverse effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine besylate@@@, a widely used antihypertensive medication, include @DISEASE_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@peripheral edema@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Flushing</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005483 @@@flushing@@@, @DISEASE_Headache @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headache@@@, @DISEASE_Pruritus @DISEASE_MESH:D011537 @@@pruritus@@@, and @DISEASE_Exanthema @DISEASE_MESH:D005076 @@@rash@@@.

citations.NLM: Ejaz AA, Fitzpatrick PM, Haley WE, Wasiluk A, Durkin AJ, Zachariah PK. Amlodipine besylate induced acute interstitial nephritis. Nephron. 2000 Aug;85(4):354-6. PMID: 10940749
citations.BibTeX: @article{10940749, title={Amlodipine besylate induced acute interstitial nephritis.}, author={Ejaz AA and Fitzpatrick PM and Haley WE and Wasiluk A and Durkin AJ and Zachariah PK}, journal={Nephron}, volume={85}, number={4}, pages={354-6}}

results.title: Amlodipine: pharmacokinetic profile of a low-clearance calcium antagonist.
results.text_hl: The pharmacokinetic properties of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ avoid the sharp fluctuations in plasma level seen with other calcium antagonists that are associated with vasodilatation-induced side effects such as @DISEASE_Tachycardia @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@, @DISEASE_Headache @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headache@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Flushing</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005483 @@@flushing@@@.

citations.NLM: Abernethy DR. Amlodipine: pharmacokinetic profile of a low-clearance calcium antagonist. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1991;17 Suppl 1():S4-7. PMID: 16296697
citations.BibTeX: @article{16296697, title={Amlodipine: pharmacokinetic profile of a low-clearance calcium antagonist.}, author={Abernethy DR}, journal={J Cardiovasc Pharmacol}, volume={17 Suppl 1}, pages={S4-7}}

results.title: Results of a 14-Week, Multicenter, Prospective, Randomized, Open-Label, Noninferiority Clinical Trial Comparing the Antihypertensive Effect and Edema Incidence of Lacidipine and Amlodipine in Older Korean Patients with Mild-to-Moderate Hypertension
results.text_hl: The most common drug-related AEs were @DISEASE_Headache @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headache@@@ (n = 3), @<m>DISEASE_Flushing</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005483 @@@facial flushing@@@ (n = 2), and @DISEASE_Dizziness @DISEASE_MESH:D004244 @@@dizziness@@@ (n = 2) in the @CHEMICAL_lacidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C060285 @@@lacidipine@@@ group, and @DISEASE_Headache @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headache@@@ (n = 6), @<m>DISEASE_Flushing</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005483 @@@facial flushing@@@ (n = 5) in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ group.

citations.NLM: Na JO, Seo HS, Choi CU, Lim HE, Kim JW, Kim EJ, Han SW, Rha SW, Park CG, Oh DJ, ELDER investigators. results.title: Amlodipine once-daily in systemic hypertension.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ was withdrawn in five @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ who experienced @DISEASE_Tang_Hsi_Ryu_syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C536897 @@@oedema@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Flushing</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005483 @@@flushing@@@.
